#summary Tee for counting the rows
#labels linux
<wiki:toc max_depth="1" />

Equivalent of the linux 'tee' program, but it only counts the number of lines.

==Compilation==


{{{
$ cd varkit/src
make ../bin/teec
}}}


==Usage==


{{{
teec file-count.txt > input > result
}}}
